definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突變作用。

sentences.english: When the second operon with OC mutation, it will continue to express.
sentences.chinese: 當第二個操縱子帶有OC突變時，它將持續表達。

sentences.english: Objective To study mutagenicity of organic distill from Chaohu lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巢湖水有機提取物致突變性。

sentences.english: The eui mutation also resulted in significant increase in flag leaf and grain length.
sentences.chinese: 該突變還引起了劍葉和粒長髮生顯著變化。

sentences.english: These results suggest that the antimutagenic and anticancer effect of White Tea are better than that of Green Tea.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出，白茶的抗突變和體外抗癌效果好於綠茶。

sentences.english: Error catastrophe theory has led to a strategy of mutagenesis to control disease viruses.
sentences.chinese: 錯誤突變理論引導了通過突變來控制致病病毒的策略。

sentences.english: Error catastrophe theory has led to a strategy of mutagenesis to control disease viruses.
sentences.chinese: 錯誤突變理論引導了通過突變來控制致病病毒的策略。

sentences.english: But curing the disease does not mean eliminating the mutation.
sentences.chinese: 不過治療該疾病並不意味着消滅這種突變。

sentences.english: So we think the dwarf mutant "DDF-1" was GA insensitive.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們認爲它是赤黴素相關突變體。

sentences.english: Then, two more mutations removed the remaining stop signs.
sentences.chinese: 然後，兩個以上的突變去除了剩下的終止密碼子。

sentences.english: The difference is not complicated. It's writing.
sentences.chinese: 突變的原因並不複雜，僅僅因爲寫作水平的差異。

sentences.english: The virus did not mutate during the pandemic to a more lethal form.
sentences.chinese: 在大流行期間這一病毒沒有突變爲某種更致命的形式。

sentences.english: In each gene, the 3A gene mutation rates are the tallest.
sentences.chinese: 在各基因中，3A基因突變率最高。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mutagenicity of Q river surface water.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了調查Q流域地面水致突變性。

sentences.english: The results show that its mutagenic actvity is negative.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該藥是致突變陰性。
